verses.text: \w Now|strong="H7971"\w* Ahab \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*,\f + \fr 10:1 \ft Hebrew; LXX and Vulgate officials of the city \f* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* guardians \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \f + \fr 10:1 \ft Hebrew does not include of the sons.\f* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahab, saying:

“\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* arrives, \w since|strong="H6258"\w* \w your|strong="H2088"\w* master’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H6258"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H6258"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fortified|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* weaponry,

\w select|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w most|strong="H2896"\w* \w worthy|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* master, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* master’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w terrified|strong="H3966"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* reasoned, “\w If|strong="H2009"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w how|strong="H2009"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w*?”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* administrator, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* overseer \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* guardians \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* message \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*: “\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* say. \w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Jehu \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*: “\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5892"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* side, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w then|strong="H3947"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* master’s \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w by|strong="H5892"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*.” \w Now|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w*, \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w being|strong="H1121"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w* \w by|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w leading|strong="H7218"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* arrived, \w they|strong="H3947"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H7819"\w* \w all|strong="H7971"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*. \w They|strong="H3947"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w baskets|strong="H1731"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Jehu \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* arrived, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Jehu, “\w They|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Jehu ordered, “Pile \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w heaps|strong="H6652"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w next|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, Jehu \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w innocent|strong="H6662"\w*. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* master \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w*?

\w Know|strong="H3045"\w*, \w then|strong="H1696"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ahab \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fail|strong="H5307"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1115"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Ahab, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* close \w friends|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w leaving|strong="H7604"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w without|strong="H1115"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single \w survivor|strong="H8300"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* Jehu \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*. \w At|strong="H6965"\w* \w Beth-eked|strong="H1044"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w Shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*,

\w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w met|strong="H4672"\w* some \w relatives|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahaziah \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* asked, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3381"\w*?” “\w We|strong="H4672"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w relatives|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahaziah,” \w they|strong="H3063"\w* answered, “\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w greet|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w queen|strong="H1377"\w* \w mother|strong="H1377"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* Jehu ordered, “\w Take|strong="H8610"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w men|strong="H1992"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, \w then|strong="H3808"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H7819"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7819"\w* well \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w Beth-eked|strong="H1044"\w*—\w forty-two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H1992"\w*. \w He|strong="H8147"\w* spared \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w left|strong="H4672"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w Jehonadab|strong="H3082"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rechab|strong="H7394"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*. Jehu \w greeted|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* asked, “\w Is|strong="H3426"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* true \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w mine|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w yours|strong="H5414"\w*?” “\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w*!” \w Jehonadab|strong="H3082"\w* replied. “\w If|strong="H3426"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w*,” said Jehu, “\w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jehu \w helped|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*,

saying, “\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!” \w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* \f + \fr 10:16 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Targum Yonaton; Hebrew they had him ride\f* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5704"\w* Jehu \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* belonging \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Ahab \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, according \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w*. Jehu Kills the Priests of Baal

\w Then|strong="H6908"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w brought|strong="H6908"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* said, “Ahab \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w*, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w him|strong="H5647"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lot.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w summon|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5647"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*. \w See|strong="H6485"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w missing|strong="H6485"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*. \w Whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w missing|strong="H6485"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w was|strong="H5030"\w* acting deceptively \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w order|strong="H4616"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w destroy|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5647"\w* \w of|strong="H2077"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1168"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* commanded, “\w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w solemn|strong="H6116"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H6942"\w* announced \w it|strong="H7121"\w*.
